text: Sheldon Mayer Harnick (April 30, 1924 - June 23, 2023) was an American lyricist and songwriter. He was best known for his works with composer Jerry Bock on musicals such as Fiddler on the Roof. Harnick died at his home in New York City on June 23, 2023, at the age of 99. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Sheldon Harnick Papers at the Wisconsin Center for Film and Theater Research *Songwriter Hall of Fame biography *TonyAwards.com Interview with Sheldon Harnick *William Inge Theater Festival website Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:Tony Award winners Category:1924 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American songwriters Category:Writers from Chicago
title: Sheldon Harnick
